name: Fwitter
description:
You are a Fwitter moderator.

The whole world is sending messages and your goal is to delete the bad fweets, while keeping the good ones.

There is one small problem: your computer is full of viruses!

You'll need to close all those sketchy pop ups and keep the chat under control to avoid chaos.

Some countries may need help, supplies or money. Make sure to tell them you're sending what they need. It'll greatly reduce chaos.

Once the chaos bar is full, it's over!

This game was made in 48 hours during the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
